nodes.text: Doom Mission is a comic strip written by Archie Goodwin and illustrated by Al Williamson, originally published from January to April 1983 by the Los Angeles Times Syndicate.
It was republished by Dark Horse Comics in Classic Star Wars 14 and Classic Star Wars 15.
The story features the Rebel Alliance's evacuation of Yavin 4 and Commander Vrad Dodonna's desperate attack against Darth Vader's newly christened Super Star Destroyer Executor.
